#labels free,cms,freecms,java,开源,免费,内容管理系统


= 系统链接=
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	从FreeCMS 1.4开始支持</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	管理在管理后台首页显示的系统链接。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084238_fLUp_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 170); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084238_fLUp_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	1. 系统链接</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	从左侧管理菜单点击系统链接进入。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084252_1VNL_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084252_1VNL_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	2. 添加系统链接</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	在系统链接列表下方点击"添加"按钮。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084304_MX0M_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084304_MX0M_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	填写相关属性后点击"确定"按钮即可。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	3. 编辑系统链接</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	选择需要编辑的系统链接，然后点击"编辑"按钮。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	注意:同时只能编辑一个系统链接。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084318_lzY5_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084318_lzY5_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084330_xkwU_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084330_xkwU_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	填写相关属性后点击"确定"按钮即可。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	4. 删除系统链接</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	选择需要删除的系统链接，然后点击"删除"按钮。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	提示:同时可以删除多个系统链接。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084342_SMxl_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084342_SMxl_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084354_FS82_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0627/084354_FS82_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	为了防止误操作，系统会提示用户是否删除，点击"确定"完成删除操作。</p>
